How the AI Engine Works

1

Data Collection

Try the Demo

Experience how the AI recommendation engine provides personalized suggestions for different user profiles.

Construction Worker from Bangladesh

Male, 26-35, moderate stress levels, working in Singapore construction industry

Risk Level:Moderate
Primary Concerns:
Work stress, family separation, financial pressure

Female, 26-35, mild stress levels, working as domestic helper in Singapore

Risk Level:Mild
Primary Concerns:
Social isolation, employer relations, homesickness

Male, 18-25, minimal stress levels, working in Malaysian manufacturing

Risk Level:Minimal
Primary Concerns:
Career development, wellness maintenance

Technical Implementation

Recommendation Strategies

  • Content-Based: Matches resources to user needs and preferences
  • Collaborative Filtering: Leverages similar users' experiences
  • Demographic: Focuses on cultural and demographic matching
  • ML-Predicted: Uses machine learning for pattern recognition
  • Hybrid: Combines multiple approaches with weighted scoring
